amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Gulf War Illness Program by $3,600,000 offset by a reduction in funds for the Pentagon Channel in the Armed Forces Network Television services by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to transfer funds from Operation and Maintenance to the Defense Health Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 253 - 167 (Roll no. 498).
